name: Switch MTL
description:
This is my ADV tobacco.  It is simple, clean tobacco without much smoke or sweetness.  I mix it up in the evening, and it is ready to go the next morning.
Tested on the Innokin Biip with a 1.6 coil.
author: goosegirl

reviews.text: Thanks for the recipe!! I'll mix it up! Sounds good and I have the concentrates. Why not? I added a little FA RY4 and it's delicious after an overnight steep. Probably need another few days but yeah. Super delicious after a day or three. My new ADV.
